trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object after an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"></xref> expression is applied.

After a sort operation is performed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> expression in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the ThenBy class on a different data field.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> sorts the data on a specified data field.

Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> collection.
This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to.
The property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
Gets or sets the ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to sort data in ascending or descending order.
The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A> property.
The ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
